lines: Fumu nga mliska mtirongozge na kutipwerera,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mukatigula ise,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mukatigula ise.
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mtipulike marombo,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mtipulike marombo.
Muna lusungu kutovwira mu uchizi winu,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, tichimbirire kwinu,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, tichimbirire kwinu.
Imwe Yesu mtaski withu mutisavye mu mtima,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mutitemwe ta winu,
Yesu withu, Yesu withu, mutitemwe ta winu.
